item.title: demystifying redux
item.description: Introduction Redux can be complicated at first. But after you understand the basics it can be very easy. This article will ensure that you understand Redux with the help of some examples. After reading this article I promise you, you will say this - This article will make you fall in love â¤ï¸ with Redux. According to the official site, Redux is a predictable state container for JavaScript Applications.
